titleInfo.title: Persistent phosphinyl radicals featuring a bulky amino substituent and the 2,6-bis(trifluoromethyl)phenyl group

mods.abstract: Persistent phosphinyl radicals featuring the 2,6-bis(trifluoromethyl)-phenyl group were prepared and characterized. Their electronic structure was theoretically investigated, and their low-temperature dimerization into the corresponding diphosphines was found to be strongly inhibited when the sterically very demanding (tert-butyl)-(trimethylsilyl)amino substituent was used.
